title: Amumu Top
body: Amumu top is very strong,and you could chose AP,AD or HP.And no one will ban this champion.

replies.body: I'm not sure he's very strong. His only cc pre six is his q. Which gets block by minions. And his w is extremely mana heavy. He'd have pretty good Tele ganks and roams. And would be able to wave clear ok. I just don't see where you get very strong from. The top lane tanks will be tankier than him in lane and the top lane carrys will probably do more damage
if you've ever played mumu you would know this haha
